about_the_game:
Zombie Dolls is a twin-stick shooter survival game with rogue-like elements. Defend your neighborhood against an invasion of cute zombiefied alien dolls using a large arsenal of guns, bombs, and melee weapons.

Choose from a powerful selection of upgrades and special skills to enhance and develop your character. The game can be played as a traditional twin-stick shooter or as an auto-shooter for a more relaxed play style.

Play with your family and friends in 2-4 player local co-op. Choose from 4 difficulty settings for kids/casual or hardcore players.

INCLUDES REMAKE OF THE ORIGINAL FLASH GAME

The game started out as a Flash game which we released way back in 2011. We decided to bring the game back but this time in glorious HD. You can choose it as a play mode within the main game. It plays the same as the original, but with many quality of life improvements, more stages, more dolls and lots of upgrades.

FEATURES

  • 3 modes: Survivor, Defender (Classic), Endless

  • 6 unique stages

  • 6 challenging bosses

  • 20 unique dolls

  • 20 pick-ups/power-ups

  • 30 achievements

  • Leaderboards

  • 2-4 player local co-op

SUPPORT US

Zombie Dolls is still in development. If you have any questions or suggestions feel free to post on the forum or send us an email.

If you want to support us you can do so by wishlisting the game, which we would really appreciate!

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Linux distribution released after 2016
  • Processor: 2 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.3+
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

name: Zombie Dolls

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 2 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.3+
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: Fend off hordes of zombified dolls using guns, bombs, bats, and boomerangs. Zombie Dolls is a light-hearted, but intense, stand your ground shoot em up game. Don't be fooled by their friendly appearance, they are tough and unrelenting!
